select r_date,sum(양식) wFood, sum(일식) jFood, sum(중식) cFood, sum(한식) kFood, sum(분식) sFood, sum(동남아) asFood from (select r_date , CASE WHEN s_category='양식' THEN count ELSE 0 END "양식", CASE WHEN s_category='일식' THEN count ELSE 0 END "일식", CASE WHEN s_category='중식' THEN count ELSE 0 END "중식", CASE WHEN s_category='한식' THEN count ELSE 0 END "한식", CASE WHEN s_category='분식' THEN count ELSE 0 END "분식", CASE WHEN s_category='동남아' THEN count ELSE 0 END "동남아" from (select s.s_category s_category,to_char(r.r_Date,'YYYY-MM-DD') r_date,count(*) count from store s inner join reservation r ON s.s_brand_name = r.r_store_name group by s.s_category,to_char(r_Date,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by to_char(r.r_Date,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) group by r_date order by r_date
